name: Galante
description:
Hello!

I've joined with a couple of friends to make a game in 1 month. I had never published any games, (have toy'd with Unity and Godot, but never finished anything) so I set myself this challenge... and, with the help of these friends, we made Galante.

It is a 2D Pixelart Topdown Adventure short game, inspired by GB/GBC zeldas.

You got only one bullet, and by hitting enemies with Melee, you reload it.

As it's my first game to be released, any feedback is welcome! Hope you like it.

Controls:
Move: ↑←↓→
Shoot: Z
Melee: X
Roll (when you get): C
Skip Talk: E/F

Developer Control's Choice:

Move: WASD
Shoot: NumPad 7
Melee: NumPad 4
Roll (when you get): NumPad 9
Skip Talk: E/F
